name: Blob-Blob
description:
Blob-Blob (the best name I could think of in 5min) is my first attempt at a Godot 2D Platformer. It should take around 10-15Min to finish, so it's pretty short :p

Credits

Scripting, most visual art and overall design and development by [me](https://opengameart.org/content/blob-blob-2d-platformer-assets)

Parallax Background remixed from [A platformer in the forest by Buch](https://opengameart.org/content/a-platformer-in-the-forest)

Title screen music from [Menu Music by mrpoly](https://opengameart.org/content/menu-music)

Level music from [Loading screen loop by Brandon Morris (aka HaelDB)](https://opengameart.org/content/menu-music)
